Im stuck in grabad
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Im stuck in grabad
By kudos on Wednesday, May 24, 2006 - 02:18 am:

One person challenged me into a fight in grabad but i dont know where the battle is. can someone tell me where is it?

By Todd Brauns on Wednesday, May 24, 2006 - 07:11 am:

Try heading to the bottom of the city, and entering the large middle building.

Look for arrows on the ground pointing to a large door which leads to a stairwell.

By Salokin on Tuesday, September 12, 2006 - 01:07 pm:

I had the same problem at the begining, but now I'm stuck on
the "Tree" thing.

By Sturnum94 on Tuesday, September 12, 2006 - 01:58 pm:

The Mock? Because if you are stuck in the Mock fight, then all you have to do is raise a good enough monster(s).
